name: Sucker for Love: Prelude
description:
FIND LOVE AND HORROR

Put the love in Lovecraftian! We all know what it's like to be lonely. But what if you simped for the biggest E-girl (Eldritch girl) in all the cosmos? How would you even get her to notice you? Luckily, with the power of a strange pink necromincon, you have the chance to make your restless dreams into a dark and terrifying reality!

GAMEPLAY

Sucker for Love is a romantic visual novel with a dark twist. It's said that the heart and brain are often at odds, and SfL puts that to the test. As you woo this otherworldly beauty, try to keep your mind from spiraling into maddening insanity! Recite the incantations for the perfect date and stave off oblivion by:

  • Performing dangerous rituals
  • Keeping your possessive eldritch date happy
  • Escaping from the horrors you unleash upon yourself

Remember: dying once or twice is a small price to pay for a smooch from an eldritch goddess!

LEGACY

Sucker for Love was originally created as an exclusive for the Dread X Collection 2. In celebration of the upcoming release of the Sucker for Love: First Date, we've made the original smash hit free for fans! Try to get win yourself a smooch from this eldritch goddess , and wishlist below to get a chance to take it to the next level!
